body:
What I think of at 6:00AM

So, you know the story of Bambi, right? Mom dies. Bambi has an owl friend. He marries someone he knew when he was younger. You know who else has this story? HARRY POTTER. HIS DAD IS A STAG. HIS MOM’S PATRONUS IS A DOE. THEY BOTH DIE. HE HAS AN OWL FRIEND. HE MARRIES SOMEONE HE KNEW AS A CHILD. HARRY POTTER IS BAMBI.

summary:
Snaters go on about 9 yr old Severus trying to hurt Petunia, when she insulted him, and a branch fell.
But I see no one say a...
body:
Snaters go on about 9 yr old Severus trying to hurt Petunia, when she insulted him, and a branch fell.

But I see no one say a dickie bird about 13 yr old Harry trying to hurt Aunt Marge, when she insulted him, and blew her up. 🤷‍♂️

Accidental magic happens especially when said wizard is angry and they don’t have full control of their magic.

summary: Draco x Harry I wrote at 5:46 in the morning.
body:
Draco x Harry I wrote at 5:46 in the morning.

Harry was talking with Ron and Hermione in the hall. Draco saw him from across the room and walked over in a slow manner.

“Hello Potter! Granger! Weasley.”

He looks down at the smaller boy.

“Is that your wand or are you just excited to see me?” He said leaning against the wall.

“Shove off Malfoy!” Harry said feeling his face getting hot.

“Alright but if you ever need company you know where to find me.” The tall blonde whispered in Harry’s ear in a seductive tone which left him with chills. Draco then walked off to the Slytherin common room. Harry stood there confused for a moment questioning what he might. Like why Malfoy was looking. Why did he talk about company?

“What the bloody hell just happened?!” Ron asked as confused as Harry was.

“I don’t even know.” He replied.

Harry was pounded with questions by Ron and Hermione for the rest of the day.

summary: Ok, Tumblr drarry fans let's see if you can help me. I read this fanfic a while ago and I really liked it but now I want to...
body: Ok, Tumblr drarry fans let’s see if you can help me. I read this fanfic a while ago and I really liked it but now I want to re-read it and I can’t find it and I don’t know what it was called. Basically the plot was that Harry was hit with a spell by Lucius Malfoy and as a result every time he fell asleep he got physically hurt and he was in constant pain when he was awake but the only thing that would stop the pain was being touched or touching or being near Draco. Does anyone happen to know which fic that might be because I’ve searched for it so many times and I can’t find it ☹

blog.name: imperio-inspo

blog.description:
Those who can make you believe absurdities, can make you commit atrocities...

Imperio HQ is an appless Marauders Era roleplay starting off in the year 1979. All of our characters have now left the safety of Hogwarts, and must learn to survive in a war torn world.

This is the Inspo Blog for Imperio-HQ

body:
Slughorn being his naive self

Tom: what if I kill 7 people and split my soul into 7 pieces and make horcruxes?

Slughorn: this is all hypothetical tom, right?

Tom: of course ;)

Tom, in his mind: I’m gonna be immortal lol
